snippet: Manager Juergen Klopp has extended his contract with Liverpool, less than a year since joining the club, the English Premier League side announced on Friday....
lead_paragraph: Manager Juergen Klopp has extended his contract with Liverpool, less than a year since joining the club, the English Premier League side announced on Friday.

snippet: Leicester City can echo Nottingham Forest's feats and prove the doubters wrong again when they compete against Europe's elite in the Champions League this season, midfielder Danny Drinkwater said....

headline.main: Leicester Can Emulate Forest's European Cup Success-Drinkwater
headline.print_headline: Leicester Can Emulate Forest's European Cup Success-Drinkwater

lead_paragraph: Leicester City can echo Nottingham Forest's feats and prove the doubters wrong again when they compete against Europe's elite in the Champions League this season, midfielder Danny Drinkwater said.

snippet: England centre back Gary Cahill is so frustrated by a lack of first-team football at Chelsea that he wants to leave the club in an attempt to safeguard his international place at the European Championship in the summer....

headline.main: Exclusive-Chelsea's Cahill Wants Move to Save England Career
headline.print_headline: Exclusive-Chelsea's Cahill Wants Move to Save England Career

lead_paragraph: England centre back Gary Cahill is so frustrated by a lack of first-team football at Chelsea that he wants to leave the club in an attempt to safeguard his international place at the European Championship in the summer.

snippet: Chelsea re-signed David Luiz and Premier League champions Leicester City broke their transfer record for striker Islam Slimani as Premier League clubs exceeded the one billion pounds barrier when the curtain fell on transfer deadline day....

headline.main: Luiz Back at Chelsea, Leicester Splash the Cash as Records Tumble
headline.print_headline: Luiz Back at Chelsea, Leicester Splash the Cash as Records Tumble

lead_paragraph: Chelsea re-signed David Luiz and Premier League champions Leicester City broke their transfer record for striker Islam Slimani as Premier League clubs exceeded the one billion pounds barrier when the curtain fell on transfer deadline day.

snippet: Arsenal got their title bid back on track with a comfortable 2-0 victory at lowly Bournemouth in the Premier League on Sunday before Manchester United were held to a 1-1 draw after conceding a stoppage time goal at Chelsea....

headline.main: Arsenal Win at Bournemouth, United Held by Chelsea
headline.print_headline: Arsenal Win at Bournemouth, United Held by Chelsea

lead_paragraph: Arsenal got their title bid back on track with a comfortable 2-0 victory at lowly Bournemouth in the Premier League on Sunday before Manchester United were held to a 1-1 draw after conceding a stoppage time goal at Chelsea.

snippet: Southampton's very own "Le God" has warned the current crop of players they need to find inspiration in front of goal if they are to flourish while leading goal scorer Charlie Austin recovers from injury....

headline.main: Find Inspiration in Front of Goal, Le God Tells Saints
headline.print_headline: Find Inspiration in Front of Goal, Le God Tells Saints

lead_paragraph: Southampton's very own "Le God" has warned the current crop of players they need to find inspiration in front of goal if they are to flourish while leading goal scorer Charlie Austin recovers from injury.

snippet: Explaining his team's latest humiliating loss, Louis van Gaal used an adage to sum up the beleaguered state of Manchester United....

snippet: Sunderland midfielder Jan Kirchhoff will be out of action for around three months after undergoing knee surgery, manager David Moyes said on Friday....

headline.main: Moyes Loses Kirchoff to Injury Ahead of Old Trafford Return
headline.print_headline: Moyes Loses Kirchoff to Injury Ahead of Old Trafford Return

lead_paragraph: Sunderland midfielder Jan Kirchhoff will be out of action for around three months after undergoing knee surgery, manager David Moyes said on Friday.

snippet: Of the extraordinary total of 38 Chelsea players out on loan to other clubs this season, none can have done the Londoners a bigger favour than Nathan Ake, whose dramatic stoppage-time goal brought Bournemouth a 4-3 win over Liverpool on Sunday....

headline.main: Chelsea Loanee Ake Leaves Liverpool Feeling Blue
headline.print_headline: Chelsea Loanee Ake Leaves Liverpool Feeling Blue

lead_paragraph: Of the extraordinary total of 38 Chelsea players out on loan to other clubs this season, none can have done the Londoners a bigger favour than Nathan Ake, whose dramatic stoppage-time goal brought Bournemouth a 4-3 win over Liverpool on Sunday.

snippet: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola will not allow his players time off for Christmas as he wants to ensure they are fully prepared for Monday's Premier League trip to basement team Hull City....

headline.main: Guardiola Cancels Christmas to Focus on Hull City
headline.print_headline: Guardiola Cancels Christmas to Focus on Hull City

lead_paragraph: Manchester City manager Pep Guardiola will not allow his players time off for Christmas as he wants to ensure they are fully prepared for Monday's Premier League trip to basement team Hull City.
